name: Jeffrey Lebowski
tagline: Client-facing engineering leader with experience in consulting, product management, & sales

bullets: Accountable for pre-sales engineering, integration development, project roadmapping/system design for junior SE’s, and managing relationships with partners that contribute over ____ in revenue to Facebook.

Developed a pulling service for ingesting conversion data from brick-and-mortar retailers. Led to an increase of ____ purchase signals brought into optimization models every year and ___ in incremental revenue.
Lead the development of the Facebook Marketing Consultant API Certification.
Client list: Little Lebowski Urban Achievers
Technical Program Manager for Bing Predicts - using Microsoft's internal Map-Reduce tool for predicting stock market results based on search data
Product owner for an incubated product called GigJam (acquired into CRM). Accountable for the product’s Developer SDK, UI, and communications channels.
Direct manager of an 8-person engineering team focused on accessibility, taking the product to pass the ADA Accessibility Guidelines.

Nurtured a development community by establishing the company’s public GitHub presence, designing and implementing the company’s developer portal, and creating Maven and npm packages to integrate with Impinj’s RFID ecosystem.
Technical Lead and SCRUM master for the backend services team of a large insurance company’s pricing and analytics system.
Partnered with Home Depot to develop a kiosk tablet application for their flooring department.
Developed a custom CRM Tablet application for Harley-Davidson showrooms. Won the Avanade delivery excellence award for the project.

experience.company: Parker LORD Corporation — Software Engineering Intern
